definition-item.definition-title: TIME OR ATTENDANCE REGISTERS; REGISTERING OR INDICATING THE WORKING OF MACHINES; GENERATING RANDOM NUMBERS; VOTING OR LOTTERY APPARATUS; ARRANGEMENTS, SYSTEMS OR APPARATUS FOR CHECKING NOT PROVIDED FOR ELSEWHERE

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Registering, indicating or recording the time of events or elapsed time of events;
Registering or indicating the condition or the working of machines or other apparatus, other than vehicles;
Registering or indicating the working of vehicles;
Details or accessories common to the registering or indicating apparatus of previous groups;
Individual entry or exit registers;
Arrangements, systems or apparatus for checking;
Voting apparatus;
Generating random numbers; lottery apparatus.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
See the list of not covered fields above and in addition:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for preventing use of vehicles
Indicating or recording apparatus for measuring in general, analogous apparatus but in which the input is not a variable to be measured, e.g. a hand operation
Recognition of biometric, human-related or animal-related patterns in image or video data

definition-item.definition-title: Registering, indicating or recording the time of events or elapsed time, e.g. time-recorders for work people (registering or indicating the working of machines or vehicles G07C3/00, G07C5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Means for recording the time or elapsed time of events of people, without recording the identity.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Registering or indicating the working of machines or vehicles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
See the list of not covered fields above

list-item.paragraph-text: Subgroups G07C1/20 - G07C1/32 take precedence over subgroups G07C1/02 - G07C1/18
When the time of events is recorded with the person's identity, e.g. working hours of a person then it is classified in G07C1/10.
Registering or indicating the condition or the working of machines or other apparatus, other than vehicles is classified in G07C3/00;
Registering or indicating the working of vehicles is classified in G07C5/00;

definition-item.definition-title: not involving the registering, indicating or recording of other data

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The registering, indicating or recording of the time of event only.

definition-item.definition-title: wherein the time is indicated in figures

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The time is indicated or displayed in figures.

definition-item.definition-title: with apparatus adapted for use with individual cards

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using individual cards and time can be printed directly on the card or recorded on other means.

definition-item.definition-title: wherein the time is indicated by marking an element, e.g. a card or tape, in position determined by the time

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The time is represented by printing a mark, which can be pre-printed representation of a clock for example.
Can be printed on a card.

definition-item.definition-title: together with the recording, indicating or registering of other data, e.g. of signs of identity

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The recording or indication of working hours (or real time) including other information like the identification of the person or the location.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Registering, indicating, or recording the time of events or elapsed time together with the recording of a continuously-varying variable

section-body.paragraph-text: Registering, indicating, or recording the time of events or elapsed time, e.g. time-recorders for work people together with the recording of other data represented by a continuously-varying variable should also be classified in G01D or the appropriate other subclass of class G01, dependent on the variable.

definition-item.definition-title: wherein the time is indicated in figures

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The time is indicated or displayed in figures.

definition-item.definition-title: with apparatus adapted for use with individual cards

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using individual cards and time (with additional information) can be printed directly on the card or recorded on other means.

definition-item.definition-title: wherein the time is indicated by marking an element, e.g. a card or tape, in a position determined by the time

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The time is represented by printing a mark, which can be pre-printed representation of a clock for example. Additional information are also printed.
Can be printed on the card.

definition-item.definition-title: with apparatus adapted for use with individual cards

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Time information printed on pre-printed marks is printed on the card.

definition-item.definition-title: Checking timed patrols, e.g. of watchman

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Patrols, e.g. for security, have to "register" at different location to prove their passage; The registration can be done with a card and reader, dedicated mobile device or mobile phones.
Can take place inside a building or on larger scale, in a complete region.

definition-item.definition-title: in connection with sports or games

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The time recording/registering of sports events in general, not provided by the subclasses G07C1/24, G07C1/26 and G07C1/28.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for race time recording/indicating are classified in
Arrangements for pigeon races are classified in
Arrangements for recording/indicating playing time are classified in

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Race time-recorders

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for recording the time of a race, e.g. marathon or ski downhill.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Arrangements for race time recording/indicating are classified in G07C1/24.
Arrangements for pigeon races are classified in G07C1/26.

definition-item.definition-title: Pigeon-timing or like equipment

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements specific to the recording of time of pigeon races.
Other types of races timing are classified in G07C1/24.

definition-item.definition-title: Indicating playing time

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for recording/indicating/registering the playing time of a game, like football, tennis. See also groups relating to the specific sports.

definition-item.definition-title: Parking meters (registering or indicating waiting time of vehicles by means driven by the vehicle G07C5/02; coin-freed parking meters G07F17/24)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Parking meters, without involving payment, installed inside vehicles, like parking discs.
Only individual marking meters, without involving payment, installed inside vehicles are classified in this group
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Registering or indicating waiting time of vehicles by means driven by the vehicle
Coin-freed parking meters i.e. parking meters per se

section-body.paragraph-text: Parking systems (comprising several parking meters) are classified in G07B15/02.
If any payment is involved, the document should be classified in G07B15/02.

definition-item.definition-title: Time-recording locks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The lock comprises means for recording the time it has been opened or failed to open. Can comprise counting means or can opened within a time window.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Locks giving an indication of unauthorised unlocking

definition-item.definition-title: Registering or indicating the condition or the working of machines or other apparatus, other than vehicles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for the monitoring of machines or apparatuses other than vehicles in order to record or indicate the condition of working.
This group does not cover the analysis of the recorded/registered data, which is classified in G05B23/00 (analysis in general) or G06F11/00 (error detection).
The monitoring of vehicles, even when it refers to construction machines (vehicles) have to be classified in G07C5/00.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Registering or indicating the working of vehicles
Testing apparatus or testing of machines incident to its manufacture
Centrally controlling a plurality of machines
Testing or monitoring of control systems
Signalling arrangements per se, e.g. indicating undesired or abnormal working conditions

definition-item.definition-title: {during manufacturing process}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for monitoring machines or apparatuses used in manufacturing processes (e.g.. drilling machines, robots, milling machines).

definition-item.definition-title: Registering or indicating working or idle time only

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Only working or idle time is recorded or indicated (monitored).

definition-item.definition-title: using counting means or digital clocks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The arrangement for monitoring machines contains electronic counting means or digital clocks for counting.

definition-item.definition-title: {Mechanical counters or clocks}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The arrangement for monitoring machines contains mechanical counting means or digital clocks for counting.

definition-item.definition-title: in graphical form

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The indication or registering of working or idle time only is done in graphical form.

definition-item.definition-title: Registering or indicating the production of the machine either with or without registering working or idle time

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for monitoring the production of machines or apparatuses (how much they produce). Can be for a electric generator for example.

definition-item.definition-title: using counting means

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The arrangement for monitoring the production of machines contains counting means.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: in graphical form

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The indication or registering of production of the machines is done in graphical form.

definition-item.definition-title: Quality control systems

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The monitoring of machines other than vehicles is done the purpose of quality control.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Finished product quality control}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The final product (after production) is checked.

definition-item.definition-title: {during manufacturing process}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The product is monitored (checked) during its manufacture.

definition-item.definition-title: Registering or indicating the working of vehicles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Details or accessories of vehicle registering devices
Arrangements for preventing use of vehicles
Registering or indicating the working of vehicles, for measuring distance travelled or combinations of speed and distance
Devices for measuring speed or acceleration
Electric testing or monitoring of control systems or parts thereof

definition-item.definition-title: {Analysing tachograph charts (arrangements for graph-reading in general G06K11/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Vehicle working data are registered on charts and analysed.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for graph reading, in general

definition-item.definition-title: {Indicating the operating range of the engine (economical driving B60R16/0236, F02B77/084; measuring liquid fuel of an engine G01F9/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Means for indicating the operating range of the vehicle (can be to the driver or remotely).
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Measuring volume of a liquid (e.g.. fuel)

definition-item.definition-title: {Indicating maintenance}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
For indicating (to the driver or remotely) that maintenance has to be done.
Analysis of vehicle data as such, not classified in this subgroup (see G05B23/00).

definition-item.definition-title: {communicating information to a remotely located station (transmission systems for measured values G08C)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Arrangements for the transmission of vehicle monitored data to a remote device (computer, network or scan tool). It includes dedicated networks in a maintenance garage or the use of intermediate means for transmission of the information (like a USB stick).
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Wireless transmission of toll road information

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
The transmission of information dedicated to parking or toll roads systems is classified in G07B15/00.
The aspect of network security protocols should be classified in H04L63/00.
The aspect of real-time data switching communication protocols should be classified in H04L65/00.
The aspects of network protocols for data switching network services H04L67/00.

definition-item.definition-title: Registering or indicating driving, working, idle, or waiting time only (apparatus forming part of taximeters G07B13/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for only registering/indicating driving, working, idle or waiting time of the vehicle.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: using counting means or digital clocks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangement for monitoring vehicles comprising counting means or digital clocks for counting.

definition-item.definition-title: in graphical form

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The registering or indication of working, driving, idle or waiting time are in graphical form.

definition-item.definition-title: Registering or indicating performance data other than driving, working, idle, or waiting time, with or without registering driving, working, idle or waiting time

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Additional information are registered or indicated, like engine performance, temperature.

definition-item.definition-title: {Diagnosing performance data (testing of vehicles G01M17/00; testing of electrical installation on vehicles G01R31/005)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangement devices for diagnosing vehicle performance data, either inside vehicle or remotely (e.g.. scan tools); Registering the performance data.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Electric testing or monitoring (analysis of data)

section-body.paragraph-text: The analysis (process for predicting faults) of the registered data should be classified in G05B23/02.

definition-item.definition-title: {Indicating performance data, e.g. occurrence of a malfunction}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Means for indicating (in vehicle or remotely) the vehicle performance (if there is a malfunction) or advising the driver (e.g.. to change gear).
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Indication of information inside vehicle, per se
Electric testing or monitoring (analysis of data)

definition-item.definition-title: {using optical means}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The performance indication is optical (e.g.. display).

definition-item.definition-title: {using audio means}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The performance indication is audio (e.g.. loudspeakers).

definition-item.definition-title: {Registering performance data (recording measured values G01D; information storage G11B)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Means for registering the vehicle performance data.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
The following subgroups take precedence (G07C5/0841+).

definition-item.definition-title: {using electronic data carriers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Electronic storage means, like black-boxes.
The storage of data from digital video cameras is also classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {wherein the data carrier is removable}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Data carrier can be for example, an IC-card or a USB stick

definition-item.definition-title: {the electronic data carrier being a digital video recorder in combination with video camera}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Storage of video data on an electronic data carrier (digital).
For example, digital storage of video taken from the vehicle during an vehicle accident.

definition-item.definition-title: {using magnetic data carriers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The storage means are magnetic data carriers

definition-item.definition-title: {wherein the data carrier is removable}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Data carrier can be for example, a floppy disk.

definition-item.definition-title: {Video recorder in combination with video camera}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Storage of video data on a magnetic data recorder (like a tape).
The electronic storage of data from digital video cameras is classified in G07C5/0866.

definition-item.definition-title: using counting means or digital clocks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangement for registering vehicles operating data comprising counting means or digital clocks for counting.

definition-item.definition-title: in graphical form

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The arrangement for registering/indicating vehicles operating data are in graphical form.

definition-item.definition-title: Details or accessories common to the registering or indicating apparatus of groups G07C3/00 and G07C5/00

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The details or accessories of the registering or indicating device, like connectors, mechanical details of the tachographs, backup battery, mounting means or printing means.

definition-item.definition-title: Individual registration on entry or exit

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Checking or registering access or egress of articles, persons or other living beings to or from restricted areas or vehicles.
Systems or arrangements for specific purposes are classified in the following groups:

list-item.paragraph-text: Payment systems with user authentication, see G07F and/or G06Q20/00
Mechanical locks and keys are classified in E05B
Security arrangements for protecting computers or computer systems against unauthorised activity, see G06F21/00
Cryptographic protocols, see H04L9/00
The control of access to computing devices is not covered by group G07C9/00, but instead by group G06F21/00
Network security protocols, see H04L63/00
Real-time communication protocols in data switching networks see H04L65/00
Network protocols for data switching network services see H04L67/00

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Biometric identification used for diagnostic purposes
Systems for preventing unauthorised use or theft of vehicles
Electric permutation locks using mechanical keys
Data processing for handling natural language data
Arrangements for sensing or reading record carriers
Record carriers for use with machines and with at least a part designed to carry digital markings
Apparatus actuated by coded identity cards or credit cards, to free or actuate vending, hiring or money-dispensing
Access to facilities or services by means of coins or tokens
Arrangements actuated by coded cards for dispensing or receiving money and posting such transactions to existing accounts, e.g. automatic teller machines

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Any document or data carrier, such as tickets, tags, key fobs, smartphones, microchips, cards, electronic keys, mobile phones or USB sticks.

definition-item.definition-title: {Electronically operated locks; Circuits therefor; Nonmechanical keys therefor, e.g. passive or active electrical keys or other data carriers without mechanical keys (mechanical locks with electric permutation E05B49/00; arrangements for sensing or reading record carriers G06K7/00; electronic switching H03K17/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Locks electronically controlled (e.g.. for building access or vehicles).
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicle fittings specially adapted for preventing or indicating unauthorised use or theft of vehicles
Mechanical locks and keys with electric permutation
Arrangements for sensing or reading record carriers

section-body.paragraph-text: If a document mentions the use of access systems in a vehicle and other use
then a class in B60R20/00 and a class in G07C9/00174 is given.

definition-item.definition-title: {operated with unidirectional data transmission between data carrier and locks}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The data transmission is done from the data carrier to the lock.

definition-item.definition-title: {operated with bidirectional data transmission between data carrier and locks}

section-body.paragraph-text: Specific communication protocols like bluetooth or WIFI are considered as bidirectional data transmission.

definition-item.definition-title: {using personal physical data of the operator, e.g. finger prints, retinal images, voicepatterns}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The door knob or handle contains a biometric reader, for example.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Access control system using biometric data for authentication of the user

definition-item.definition-title: {operated by interacting with a central unit}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

At least one electronic lock centrally controlled through a network; one of the locks can be the central controller; the electronic locks can exchange data with the other locks and/or with the central controller; the network can a LAN (or a WLAN) or any kind of network (telecom).
Access control systems (not the electronic locks per se) with central registration and control should be classified either in G07C9/27 or G07C9/38, depending if they involve the use of a pass or not.

definition-item.definition-title: {operated by passive electrical keys}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The key does not contain any active mean (processor...).
The key is not necessarily physical (e.g.. PIN).
In this group (G07C9/00658 /B/C/D/F/G) the equivalent Indexing Code-code take precedence.

definition-item.definition-title: {actuated repeatedly}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Sequential pulses, for example.

definition-item.definition-title: {actuated in a predetermined sequence}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
For entering a code (PIN) for example.

definition-item.definition-title: {actuated in function of displayed informations}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Some instructions are displayed.

definition-item.definition-title: {with conductive components, e.g. pins, wires, metallic strips}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Electrical connectors for data transmission between key and lock.

definition-item.definition-title: {with magnetic components, e.g. magnets, magnetic strips, metallic inserts (mechanical locks operated by permanent magnets E05B47/0038)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mechanical locks operated by permanent magnets

definition-item.definition-title: {specially adapted for particular uses}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Lockers arrangements, specific systems for houses
Electronically operated locks of key cabinets (or key cupboards or key-boxes)

section-body.paragraph-text: Key safes (key cabinets, key cupboards or key-boxes) are classified in E05B19/0005.

definition-item.definition-title: {for safes, strong-rooms, vaults or the like}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Banking systems with automatic teller machines (ATM)

definition-item.definition-title: {Details of construction or manufacture}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Specific construction of the electronic key or lock.

definition-item.definition-title: Movable barriers with registering means

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for controlling the access using turnstiles or the like.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for collecting fares based on distance and with turnstiles

definition-item.definition-title: involving the use of a pass

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements where the user possess a data carrier for accessing. The data carrier can be a card, electronic key, mobile phone, USB stick or equivalents.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Electromagnetical or electronical keys and locks

section-body.paragraph-text: For the record carrier itself, see G06K19/00 and G06K7/00.
Identification carriers per se, (like passports or ID cards) see B42D25/00

definition-item.definition-title: having a variable access code

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The data carrier, used by a person, which contains an access code and which changes every time used (e.g. rolling codes or random codes).
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Individual registration involving the use of a pass with central registration

definition-item.definition-title: {the system having a variable access-code, e.g. varied as a function of time}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using codes contained in a data carrier being changed based on time (function of time).

definition-item.definition-title: in combination with an identity check of the pass holder

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Any kind of identity verification of the pass-holder that is carried out (PIN, signature, visually or electronically) without specifying any specific method.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Recognition of biometric, human-related or animal-related patterns in image or video data

definition-item.definition-title: by means of a password

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using any kind of password (PIN, spoken password) for accessing.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Access-control involving the use of a pass in combination with an identity-check of the pass-holder by means of a pass-word in case of payment

definition-item.definition-title: by means of a handwritten signature

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Using pass-holder's signature for identity verification.
Groups G06V30/32, G06V30/226 and G06V40/30 take precedence if the disclosure is based on the way the signature is verified.

definition-item.definition-title: using biometric data, e.g. fingerprints, iris scans or voice recognition

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The use of biometric information of the pass-holder comprising e.g. fingerprints, voice, ADN, face, hand, internal ear, etc.
Group G06V40/00 takes precedence if the disclosure is based on the way the biometrics are analysed.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Measuring or recording devices for testing the shape, pattern, size or movement of the body or parts thereof per se
Speaker or speech identification per se

definition-item.definition-title: {visually}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Visual checks done by a third party, e.g. security personnel, seller, policeman, etc.

definition-item.definition-title: {electronically (G07C9/26 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Electronic checks with reference information.
For cryptography involving biometric data, see H04L9/00 and classification symbol H04L9/3231.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Using a biometric sensor integrated in the pass

section-body.paragraph-text: Indexing Codes under G07C are used for the following subjects:
Data carriers comprising sensor for capturing personal physical data
Data carrier with sensor
Data carrier with fingerprint sensor
Data carrier with DNA info

definition-item.definition-title: with central registration

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Access control systems with data carrier having a central control or registration, e.g. over a network.
Centrally controlled electronically operated locks are classified in G07C9/00571.

definition-item.definition-title: the pass enabling tracking or indicating presence

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Tracking users with data carriers, e.g. RFIDs, inside a facility.
Identification means with home arrest means.
For home arrest as such, consult also G08B21/22.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Means for indicating the location of accidentally buried persons
Detecting presence by using magnetic or electric fields produced or modified by objects in general
Tracking of objects, for inventory purpose

definition-item.definition-title: the pass containing active electronic elements, e.g. smartcards

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The pass that has several functions, for example, for access and payment purposes.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Record carriers used within a machine

definition-item.definition-title: not involving the use of a pass

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Arrangements for access control without the use of any data carrier by the requester.
Use of access code or other means for checking the authorisation.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Access to facilities or services by means of coins or tokens

definition-item.definition-title: in combination with an identity check

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Any kind of authorization verification of the person that is carried out (PIN, signature, visually or electronically) without specifying any specific method.

definition-item.definition-title: by means of a password

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The access needs by the use of any kind of password (PIN, spoken password) for accessing.

definition-item.definition-title: using biometric data, e.g. fingerprints, iris scans or voice recognition

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The use of biometric information of the pass-holder comprising (fingerprints, voice, ADN, face, hand, internal ear)
For cryptography involving biometric data, see H04L9/00 and classification symbol H04L9/3231.
Recognition of biometric, human-related or animal-related patterns in image or video data, see G06V40/00.

definition-item.definition-title: with central registration

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Access control systems, not using a data carrier and having a central control or registration, (e.g. over a network).

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements, systems or apparatus for checking, e.g. the occurrence of a condition, not provided for elsewhere

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: Queuing systems in a shop, administration or attraction park (determination of waiting time in the queue);
Electronic guide tour in museums (mobile device providing audio or visual information to visitors).

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Electronically operated locks of key cabinets (or key cupboards or key-boxes)
Key safes (key cabinets, key cupboards or key-boxes)

definition-item.definition-title: Voting apparatus

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
All kind of voting systems (electronic, local, remote, by post mail or through internet).
For cryptographic aspects, see H04L9/30 or H04L9/32.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for monitoring user's behaviour or opinion

definition-item.definition-title: {operating mechanically}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Mechanical arrangements for voting.

definition-item.definition-title: Ballot boxes

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
All kind of ballot boxes.

definition-item.definition-title: Generating random numbers; Lottery apparatus

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for generating random numbers and not covered by the subgroups.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Games in general, e.g. card, board or roulette games
Digital computer arrangements for generating random or pseudo-random numbers
Gaming machines involving electronic lottery games
Generating electric pulses at random intervals

definition-item.definition-title: {with balls or the like}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for random generators using balls or equivalent.

definition-item.definition-title: {hand-held}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Portable random generators using balls or equivalent.

definition-item.definition-title: {with dispensing of lottery tickets}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for dispensing tickets in a random way.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
in case of paper tickets:

table-column.paragraph-text: Details for cutting-off or separating tickets
Holders for providing access to tickets

definition-item.definition-title: {electronically}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for electronically generating random numbers.
The specific electronic circuits are classified in G06F7/58

definition-item.definition-title: {electronic dies}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Electronic dices;
Means for reading the dices (like cameras or sensors).
